name: RAZER
description:
RΛZΞR

 If you can't control the player with the movement keys reload this page (there's a bug that disables the keys).

Hello and welcome to RΛZΞR, a fps game where you fight evil robots! Instructions are in the game. This game was made on Scratch by PandaTimmyMrT ( me ). Watch the Official Launch Trailer

Credits

Thanks to Turbowarp.org for generating the HTML file for me. Thanks to Minecraft for the thunder sounds. Thanks to Google for the fonts! Thanks to Neo Nomen for the song "RE:RUN"

Please visit PandaTimmyMrT on YouTube and PandaTimmyMrT on Scratch

Note: If you can't control the player with the movement keys reload this page (there's a bug that disables the keys).
